doc.previous: The ICT sector of Zimbabwe has been growing at a fast pace A report by the mobile internet browser company Opera in June July 2011 has ranked Zimbabwe as Africa s fastest growing market 121 122
doc.after: Since 1 January 2002 the government of Zimbabwe has had its lines of credit at international financial institutions frozen through US legislation called the Zimbabwe Democracy and Economic Recovery Act of 2001 ZDERA Section 4C instructs the Secretary of the Treasury to direct directors at international financial institutions to veto the extension of loans and credit to the Zimbabwean government 123 According to the United States these sanctions target only seven specific businesses owned or controlled by government officials and not ordinary citizens 124 An independent study has shown that the sanctions have adversely affected the welfare of ordinary citizens 125
